original: nyon mongs pa can nyid dang / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid du 'dra ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can nyid dang / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid du 'dra ba'i phyir /
translated: they are similar in being afflicted and in being objects to be abandoned by the path of seeing the truth of suffering.

original: sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur rnam par gzhag pas 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur rnam par gzhag pas 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore there is no contradiction in positing them as the result of natural outflow of the omnipresent cause that is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering and as the result of natural outflow of the homogeneous cause that is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering.

original: las lung du ma bstan pa'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /üîΩskyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni dge ba'i chos gang dag de'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba de dag go //
analyzed: las lung du ma bstan pa'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni dge ba'i chos gang dag de'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba de dag go //
translated: The result of conscious effort is any virtuous phenomenon that occurs immediately after it.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa dge ba'i chos thams cad nyid do //üîΩrgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu med de /
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa dge ba'i chos thams cad nyid do // rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu med de /
translated: The dominant result is all virtuous phenomena that occur after it, excluding those that occur immediately after it.

original: mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //üîΩrnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med de /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro // rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med de /
translated: There is no result that is a natural outflow because it is dissimilar.

original: dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩbral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de /
analyzed: dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro // bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de /
translated: There is no result that is a karmic maturation because it is virtuous.

original: 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩmi dge ba ni gsum ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu @72a * //
analyzed: 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro // mi dge ba ni gsum ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu @72a * //
translated: There is no result that is separation because it is a conditioned state.üîΩNonvirtuous karma has three results:

original: bcug ste'o // mi dge ba yang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi 'bras bu yin pa ni yod de /
analyzed: bcug ste'o // mi dge ba yang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi 'bras bu yin pa ni yod de /
translated: Nonvirtuous karma is the result of both virtuous and nonvirtuous karma.

original: dper na chos mi dge bas ris lnga pa rnams 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba gnyis pa'i 'bras bu bcug ste'o //
analyzed: dper na chos mi dge bas ris lnga pa rnams 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba gnyis pa'i 'bras bu bcug ste'o //
translated: For example, the five types of nonvirtuous karmic paths are the result of the two views of the afflicted view of the self and the extreme view.

original: mi dge ba yang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi 'bras bu yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mi dge ba yang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi 'bras bu yin pa bzhin no //
translated: Nonvirtuous actions are the effect of neutral actions.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni gsum ste /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni gsum ste /
translated: There are three neutral phenomena:

original: de dag kho na yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de dag kho na yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: They are just those three.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang / mjug thogs su 'byung ba dag go //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang / mjug thogs su 'byung ba dag go //
translated: The effect of conscious effort is coemergent and subsequent.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa thams cad do //
translated: The dominant effect is all except for that which occurs earlier.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba phyis skyes pa rnams so //üîΩrnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ni med de /
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba phyis skyes pa rnams so // rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ni med de /
translated: The effect of natural outflow is similar phenomena that arise later.

original: lung du ma bstan pa rnams la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa rnams la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no effect of karmic maturation or effect of separation because neutral phenomena have no effect of karmic maturation and they are not antidotes to affliction.

original: 'das pa'i thams cad gzhi yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa'i thams cad gzhi yin no //
translated: All past states are the basis.

original: zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: This is stated in the Abhidharmakosa.

original: 'dir rigs yongs su bzung nas de skad du bshad kyi 'das pa thams cad 'das pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rigs yongs su bzung nas de skad du bshad kyi 'das pa thams cad 'das pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ni ma yin no //
translated: The answer is that the result is mentioned in this way by taking the whole class, but it is not the case that all past actions have all four results.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni de 'dus ma byas yin pa nyid kyi dus su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni de 'dus ma byas yin pa nyid kyi dus su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The exception is the result of separation, because it is unconditioned and therefore not included in the three times.

original: las dge ba dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / mi dge ba 'das pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa 'das pa'o //
analyzed: las dge ba dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / mi dge ba 'das pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa 'das pa'o //
translated: The ripened result of past wholesome and contaminated or unwholesome actions is a past ripened result.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni 'das pa'i las dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang / de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i chos 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni 'das pa'i las dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang / de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i chos 'das pa rnams so //
translated: The result of conscious effort of past actions is past phenomena that occur simultaneously with the action or that arise later through its power.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de'i rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang / phyis 'byung ba 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de'i rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang / phyis 'byung ba 'das pa rnams so //
translated: The dominant result of past actions is past phenomena that occur simultaneously with the action or that arise later, except for its essential nature.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dra ba phyis byung ba 'das pa rnams kho na'o //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dra ba phyis byung ba 'das pa rnams kho na'o //
translated: The result that resembles its cause is past phenomena that arise later and are similar to the past action.

original: de bzhin du 'bras bu da ltar ba yang bzhi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'bras bu da ltar ba yang bzhi ste /
translated: So too, the present effect has four effects.

original: 'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa da ltar ba'o //
analyzed: 'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa da ltar ba'o //
translated: The ripened effect of a past action is a present ripened effect.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni sngar ma byung ba'i chos 'dra ba da ltar ba rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni sngar ma byung ba'i chos 'dra ba da ltar ba rnams so //
translated: The effect resembling its cause is present similar phenomena that have not occurred previously.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni chos da ltar ba 'das pa'i las kyi stobs kyis skyes pa rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni chos da ltar ba 'das pa'i las kyi stobs kyis skyes pa rnams so //
translated: The effect of the dominant condition is present phenomena that arise through the power of past karma.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu na da ltar ba thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu na da ltar ba thams cad kho na'o //
translated: The dominant effect is all present phenomena.

original: ma 'ongs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya ste /
translated: The future effect should be stated in the same way.

original: 'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
translated: The ripened effect of a past action is a future ripened effect.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i @72b 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //üîΩskyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs kyis skye bar 'gyur ba rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i @72b 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so // skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs kyis skye bar 'gyur ba rnams so //
translated: The effect resembling its cause is future similar phenomena.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni thams cad kho na'o //
translated: The effect of the dominant condition is all future phenomena.

original: bar ma'i ni ma 'ongs pa 'ang zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu bzhi ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bar ma'i ni ma 'ongs pa 'ang zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu bzhi ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The result of natural outflow is similar to it.üîΩThe result of conscious effort is future states that arise immediately after it.üîΩThe dominant result is all future states.üîΩThe maturational result is its future karmic maturation.

original: de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i mjug thogs su skye ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i mjug thogs su skye ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
translated: The result of conscious effort is future states that arise immediately after it.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni ma 'ongs pa thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni ma 'ongs pa thams cad kho na'o //
translated: The dominant result is all future states.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
translated: The maturational result is its future karmic maturation.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
translated: The result of natural outflow is future states that are similar to it.

original: da ltar byung ba'i las kyi da ltar ba ni gnyis te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i las kyi da ltar ba ni gnyis te /
translated: The present karma has two results:

original: skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go zhes bya ba la /üîΩde'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go zhes bya ba la / de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig skyes pa yin no //
translated: the result of conscious effort and the dominant result.üîΩThe result of conscious effort is that which arises simultaneously with it.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu de dang gzhan dus mnyam du skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu de dang gzhan dus mnyam du skyes pa yin no //
translated: The dominant result is that which arises simultaneously with it and that which arises later.

original: da ltar ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu da ltar ba ni med de /
analyzed: da ltar ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu da ltar ba ni med de /
translated: The effect of natural outflow and the effect of conscious effort are not present because

original: der rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dus snga phyir nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dus snga phyir nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: cause and effect are definitely sequential.

original: ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa gsum yin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste /üîΩskyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs la rag las te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa gsum yin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs la rag las te /
translated: The effect of separation is not present because it is not included in the three times.

original: 'byung ba de dag go //
analyzed: 'byung ba de dag go //
translated: The effect of conscious effort is those things that occur in dependence on the power of that cause.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa thams cad do //
translated: The dominant effect is all conditioned states except for the cause itself.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
translated: The effect of karmic maturation is the future karmic maturation of virtuous and nonvirtuous karma.

original: ma skyes pa rnams ni skal ba mnyam pa dang / kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu nyid ma yin pas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa med do //üîΩbral ba'i 'bras bu yang med do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa rnams ni skal ba mnyam pa dang / kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu nyid ma yin pas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa med do // bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med do //
translated: The effect of natural outflow does not exist in the future because future states are neither homogeneous nor omnipresent causes.

original: dus su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The effect of separation does not exist because it is not included in the three times.

original: rang gi sa pa bzhi yin no //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rang gi sa pa bzhi yin no // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Four are of its level.

original: 'di yang srid tshad kyi dbang du byas nas bshad kyi /
analyzed: 'di yang srid tshad kyi dbang du byas nas bshad kyi /
translated: This is explained from the perspective of the measure of existence.

original: rang gis pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rang gis pa'i chos bzhi pa thams cad ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gis pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rang gis pa'i chos bzhi pa thams cad ni ma yin no //
translated: But not all results of its level are four dharmas of its level.

original: zag pa med pa la yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med mod kyi /
analyzed: zag pa med pa la yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med mod kyi /
translated: Also, though uncontaminated states have no maturational result,

original: rang gi sa pa'i chos 'dod pa na spyod pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo ba'i bar ci rigs par las zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa'i chos 'dod pa na spyod pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo ba'i bar ci rigs par las zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: the results of contaminated and uncontaminated karma are four: the four dharmas of its level from the desire realm to the summit of existence.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
translated: Except for the result of separation.

original: zhes bya ba ni bral ba pas ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bral ba pas ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not subsumed by the agent of separation.

original: de la rang gi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni las zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu bzhi yin @73a * //
analyzed: de la rang gi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni las zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu bzhi yin @73a * //
translated: Therein, contaminated dharmas of its level are the four results of contaminated karma.

original: la ; zag pa med pa rnams ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: la ; zag pa med pa rnams ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Uncontaminated states are the results of conscious effort and dominant result.

original: zag pa med pa rnams ni zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu gsum yin te /
analyzed: zag pa med pa rnams ni zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu gsum yin te /
translated: Uncontaminated states are the three uncontaminated results

original: rnam par smin pa dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
translated: because the maturational result and the liberated result are excluded.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa ni gnyis yin te /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa ni gnyis yin te /
translated: Contaminated states are the two results

original: rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
translated: because the maturational result, the result of natural outflow, and the liberated result are excluded.

original: de ltar na rang gi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams ni mdor bsdus te las zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rang gi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams ni mdor bsdus te las zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, in brief, contaminated and uncontaminated states of one's own level are the four results of contaminated and uncontaminated karma.

original: gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang / gnyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang / gnyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: Three and two of other levels

original: zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dbye bas phye nas bstan te /üîΩzag pa med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu zag pa med pa'i chos gzhan gyi sa pa ni gsum ste /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dbye bas phye nas bstan te / zag pa med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu zag pa med pa'i chos gzhan gyi sa pa ni gsum ste /
translated: are mentioned by dividing them into contaminated and uncontaminated.

original: skyes bu byed pa dang / bdag po dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa dang / bdag po dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu rnams so //
translated: The three results of uncontaminated karma that are uncontaminated states of other levels are the result of conscious effort, the dominant result and the result of natural outflow.üîΩThe two results of contaminated karma that are contaminated states of other levels are the result of conscious effort and the dominant result.

original: sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du /
analyzed: sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du /
translated: The path of the nine levels is

original: mnyam dang khyad par can yin zhes 'byung bas /
analyzed: mnyam dang khyad par can yin zhes 'byung bas /
translated: equal and special.

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pas zag pa med pa'i chos mnyam pa dang / khyad par can rnams gzhan gyi sa pa yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pas zag pa med pa'i chos mnyam pa dang / khyad par can rnams gzhan gyi sa pa yin du zin kyang /
translated: Since it is a homogeneous cause, uncontaminated phenomena that are equal and special, even though they belong to other levels,

original: gzhan gyi sa pa'i las zag pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sa pa'i las zag pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: are the effect of natural outflow of the karma of other levels.

original: khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: Because they do not belong to the realms.

original: zag pa med pa'i las ni khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi srid do //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i las ni khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi srid do //
translated: Uncontaminated karma does not have a maturational effect because it does not belong to the realms.

original: bral ba yang khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyi sa pa nyid mi srid do //üîΩgzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni de nyid kyi gnyis yin te /
analyzed: bral ba yang khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyi sa pa nyid mi srid do // gzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni de nyid kyi gnyis yin te /
translated: Because freedom does not belong to the realms, it is impossible for it to be the effect of other levels.

original: skyes bu byed pa dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go //
translated: Contaminated phenomena of other levels are the two effects of the effect of conscious effort and the effect of natural outflow.

original: de bzhin du gzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams kyang zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi gnyis yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams kyang zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi gnyis yin te /
translated: Neither learners nor nonlearners are the dominant result of learner karma.üîΩThe result of separation does not exist because they are not learners.

original: skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go //
translated: The result of karmic maturation does not exist because they are not learners.üîΩThe result of natural outflow does not exist because they are not learners.üîΩThe result of conscious effort does not exist because they are not learners.

original: rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: The result of separation does not exist because they are not learners.üîΩThe result of karmic maturation does not exist because they are not learners.üîΩThe result of natural outflow does not exist because they are not learners.üîΩThe result of conscious effort does not exist because they are not learners.üîΩThe result of separation does not exist because they are not learners.üîΩThe result of karmic maturation does not exist because they are not learners.

original: slob pa 'am mi slob pa ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'am bral ba'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: slob pa 'am mi slob pa ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'am bral ba'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: The result of natural outflow does not exist because they are not learners.üîΩThe result of conscious effort does not exist because they are not learners.

translated: These are improper actions because they are not in accord with the rules of proper conduct, with the time, with the place, and with the person.

original: rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa 'di ni brdar btags pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa 'di ni brdar btags pa yin gyi /
translated: Improper motivation is a conventional term.

original: don dam par ni rigs pas bskyed pa ni dge ba'i las yin la /
analyzed: don dam par ni rigs pas bskyed pa ni dge ba'i las yin la /
translated: In the ultimate sense, virtuous karma is that which is generated by proper motivation.

original: rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa ni nyon mongs pa can yin zhing /üîΩde gnyi ga dang bral ba ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa ni nyon mongs pa can yin zhing /üîΩde gnyi ga dang bral ba ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
translated: Nonvirtuous karma is that which is generated by improper motivation.üîΩKarma that is neither virtuous nor nonvirtuous is that which is generated by motivation that is neither of those two.

original: ci las gcig gis skye ba gcig kho na 'phen tam zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: ci las gcig gis skye ba gcig kho na 'phen tam zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
translated: Does a single karma project a single birth or not?

original: rgyu'i dngos por gnas sam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyu'i dngos por gnas sam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the question, ‚ÄúDo they exist as causes?‚Äù

original: gal te las du mas skye ba gcig 'phen pa dang / gcig gis du ma 'phangs na cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te las du mas skye ba gcig 'phen pa dang / gcig gis du ma 'phangs na cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If a single birth is projected by many karmas and many are projected by a single karma, what would be the problem?

original: re zhig dang po ltar na ris mthun pa dum bur 'phen pas skye ba gcig kho na la las kyi 'bras bu gcig zad cing las gzhan gyi 'bras bu skye ba na 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sngon gyi dus kyi srid pa
analyzed: re zhig dang po ltar na ris mthun pa dum bur 'phen pas skye ba gcig kho na la las kyi 'bras bu gcig zad cing las gzhan gyi 'bras bu skye ba na 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sngon gyi dus kyi srid pa
translated: If the first is true, then since a single birth would be projected by many parts of a class affiliate, when the result of one karma is exhausted in a single birth and the result of another karma arises, then death and birth would occur.

original: kho na la 'chi ba dang skye ba'i srid pa lan cig ma yin par yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kho na la 'chi ba dang skye ba'i srid pa lan cig ma yin par yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the prior state of existence would not be a single state of death and birth.

original: gcig gis du ma 'phen pas yang ma yin te /üîΩde ltar na ni las gcig kho na skyes nas myong bar @75a * //
analyzed: gcig gis du ma 'phen pas yang ma yin te / de ltar na ni las gcig kho na skyes nas myong bar @75a * //
translated: If the second is true, then a single birth would not be projected by many karmas.

original: 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur bar yang 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur bar yang 'gyur na /
translated: If that were so, then a single karma would be experienced after rebirth and experienced in a third life.

original: de ni 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: That is unacceptable.

original: las gnas skabs nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las gnas skabs nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the state of the karma is definite.

original: de'i phyir las gcig kho nas skye ba gcig 'phen gyi du ma ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir las gcig kho nas skye ba gcig 'phen gyi du ma ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de grub po //
translated: Therefore, it is established that one birth is projected by one karma alone, not by many.

original: gal te las gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen no zhes bya ba de ltar nges pa yin na ni /üîΩ'o na gnas pas nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te las gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen no zhes bya ba de ltar nges pa yin na ni / 'o na gnas pas nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is definite that one birth is projected by one karma alone,üîΩthen it is definite that one birth is sustained by one karma alone.

original: de'i phyir las gcig las gcig bsgyur te zhes bya ba ni bsgrubs shing bsags zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir las gcig las gcig bsgyur te zhes bya ba ni bsgrubs shing bsags zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, one karma is transformed into one birth means that it is accomplished and accumulated.

original: de bsod snyoms de la brten te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: de bsod snyoms de la brten te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: In dependence on that alms-giving means in dependence on that karma.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bsod snyoms gcig pa 'di'i rnam par smin pas zhes bya ba brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bsod snyoms gcig pa 'di'i rnam par smin pas zhes bya ba brjod do //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the ripening of that one alms-giving is this.

original: bsod snyoms ni sems pa de rnams kyi rten du bstan to //
analyzed: bsod snyoms ni sems pa de rnams kyi rten du bstan to //
translated: Alms-giving is taught to be the basis of those intentions.

original: 'di ltar mir mtshungs mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar mir mtshungs mod kyi /
translated: Although they are similar in being human,

original: kha cig dbang po tshang la kha cig dbang po ma tshang ste /
analyzed: kha cig dbang po tshang la kha cig dbang po ma tshang ste /
translated: some have complete faculties and some have incomplete faculties.

original: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i las mang ba'i phyir dang / 'phen par byed pa'i las 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i las mang ba'i phyir dang / 'phen par byed pa'i las 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the action of completing is many, and because the projecting action is similar.

original: de lta ma yin na skye ba 'phangs na 'ga' yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na skye ba 'phangs na 'ga' yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then when birth is projected, no one would have incomplete faculties.

original: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa gzhan yang yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa gzhan yang yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is also another action that has karmic maturation.

original: las dang 'bras bu'i gcig pa'i tshogs thams cad do //
analyzed: las dang 'bras bu'i gcig pa'i tshogs thams cad do //
translated: All the collections of actions and results are the same.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are co-originating causes.

original: sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dag /'phen byed ma yin zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dag /'phen byed ma yin zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The two mindless meditative attainments are not projectors.

original: las dang lhan cig mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las dang lhan cig mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not co-occur with action.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa de gnyis ni sems pa zhes bya ba'i las dang lhan cig mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa de gnyis ni sems pa zhes bya ba'i las dang lhan cig mi 'byung ste /
translated: Those two meditative attainments do not co-occur with the action called intention.

original: phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mutually exclusive.

original: lus dang ngag gi las dag dang yang ma yin te /
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi las dag dang yang ma yin te /
translated: They also do not co-occur with the actions of body and speech.

original: sems med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mindless.

original: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang ris mthun pa mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang ris mthun pa mi byed do //
translated: Nor do those that possess karmic maturation project a life-stream,

original: las pas 'bras bu mang po'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las pas 'bras bu mang po'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect is greater than the action.

original: gal te ris mthun pa 'phen par byed pa'i las dang lhan cig 'byung mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te ris mthun pa 'phen par byed pa'i las dang lhan cig 'byung mod kyi /
translated: Even though the action that projects a life-stream occurs simultaneously with the action that produces the effect,

original: de dang 'bras bu gcig pa ni ma yin pas de rnams kyis kyang mi 'phen te /
analyzed: de dang 'bras bu gcig pa ni ma yin pas de rnams kyis kyang mi 'phen te /
translated: it does not project the life-stream because it is not of the same effect.

original: ji ltar de dag gi 'bras bu gcig ma yin pa de ltar ni mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par bshad zin to //
analyzed: ji ltar de dag gi 'bras bu gcig ma yin pa de ltar ni mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par bshad zin to //
translated: Just as it is not of the same effect, it was explained in the second chapter of the Abhidharmako≈õa.

original: sgrib pa gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: sgrib pa gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
translated: The three obscurations and so on are stated.

original: las nyid sgrib pa yin pas na las kyi sgrib pa'o //
analyzed: las nyid sgrib pa yin pas na las kyi sgrib pa'o //
translated: Karma is an obscuration, thus it is karmic obscuration.

original: nyon mongs pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Afflictive and karmic maturation obscurations should be understood in the same way.

original: de la drag po'i rgyan du @75b 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / de la yang rgyun du 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gnyis ka yang sgrib pa yin no //
analyzed: de la drag po'i rgyan du @75b 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / de la yang rgyun du 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gnyis ka yang sgrib pa yin no //
translated: Among them, that which arises as a fierce ornament and that which arises continuously are both obscurations.

original: 'phags pa'i lam la zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa la ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam la zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa la ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the noble path‚Äù refers to right view and so on.

original: de dag yod na de mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag yod na de mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when they exist, it does not arise.

original: 'phags pa'i lam la sbyor bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni mi sdug pa dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa dran pa dang / dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam la sbyor bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni mi sdug pa dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa dran pa dang / dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the noble path‚Äù refers to the practice of meditation on foulness, mindfulness of breathing, the stage of heat, and so on.

original: ngan song la sogs pa nges par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni dmyal ba dang yi dags dang dud 'gror nges par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ngan song la sogs pa nges par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni dmyal ba dang yi dags dang dud 'gror nges par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the lower realms‚Äù refers to the realms of hell, hungry ghosts, and animals.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'du shes med pa dang / tshangs pa chen por nges par 'gyur ba'i las kyang bsdu la /
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'du shes med pa dang / tshangs pa chen por nges par 'gyur ba'i las kyang bsdu la /
translated: The word ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes karma that leads to rebirth as a god without discrimination or as MahƒÅbrahmƒÅ.

original: za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should also be mentioned that karma can lead to rebirth as a eunuch, a neuter, or a hermaphrodite.

original: sgo nga las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / drod gsher las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bud med nyid du 'gyur ba dang / srid pa brgyad par nges par 'gyur ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i rgyud la sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
analyzed: sgo nga las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / drod gsher las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bud med nyid du 'gyur ba dang / srid pa brgyad par nges par 'gyur ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i rgyud la sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
translated: Others are born from eggs, born from heat and moisture, or born female, or they are definitely destined to have eight existences.

original: drod gsher las skyes pa dang / bud med nyid rnam par mi smin pa yin gyi sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa rnams bden pa mthong bar ni mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: drod gsher las skyes pa dang / bud med nyid rnam par mi smin pa yin gyi sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa rnams bden pa mthong bar ni mi 'gal lo //
translated: In the mindstream of an ƒÅrya, birth from an egg, birth from heat and moisture, and being female are not fully ripened results, but it is not contradictory that birth from an egg and so on are seen by one who sees the four truths.

original: bden pa mthong ba ni lha 'am mi dag gi nang du srid pa brgyad par nying mtshams sbyor ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba ni lha 'am mi dag gi nang du srid pa brgyad par nying mtshams sbyor ba yang ma yin no //
translated: One who sees the four truths does not link with eight existences as a god or human.

original: bstan par sla ba ni gzhan dag la'o //üîΩgdags par sla ba ni bdag nyid kyis te /
analyzed: bstan par sla ba ni gzhan dag la'o // gdags par sla ba ni bdag nyid kyis te /
translated: It is easy to teach others.

original: gdags par nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdags par nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is easy to designate by oneself because one is able to designate it.

original: rnam pa gcig tu na bstan par sla zhing gdags par sla zhes bya ba ni tshig phyi ma snga ma'i bshad par bstan to //
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu na bstan par sla zhing gdags par sla zhes bya ba ni tshig phyi ma snga ma'i bshad par bstan to //
translated: In another way, it is easy to teach and easy to designate is explained as the explanation of the latter words in terms of the former.

original: gzhi dang zhes bya ba ni gzhis te /
analyzed: gzhi dang zhes bya ba ni gzhis te /
translated: The basis is the reason.

original: mtshams med pa gsum gyi gzhi ni srog gcod pa'i las kyi lam yin no //
analyzed: mtshams med pa gsum gyi gzhi ni srog gcod pa'i las kyi lam yin no //
translated: The basis of the three immediate karmas is the karmic path of killing.

original: bzhi pa'i gzhi ni brdzun du smra ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i gzhi ni brdzun du smra ba'o //
translated: The basis of the fourth is lying.

original: lnga pa'i gzhi ni srog gcod par sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: lnga pa'i gzhi ni srog gcod par sbyar ba yin no //
translated: The basis of the fifth is instigating killing.

original: 'bras bu ni 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni 'bras bu ste /
translated: The result is the result.

original: mtshams med pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshams med pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the result of all the immediate karmas is unpleasant.

original: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba ste /
translated: The realm is the realm.

original: de'i rnam par smin pa ni dmyal ba'i 'gro ba kho nar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam par smin pa ni dmyal ba'i 'gro ba kho nar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Its karmic maturation is experienced only in the hell realm.

original: skye ba ni skye ba ste /
analyzed: skye ba ni skye ba ste /
translated: Birth is birth.

original: skyes pa'i mjug thogs kho nar myong bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes pa'i mjug thogs kho nar myong bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is experienced immediately after birth.
